data.eml:eml: Nine eriophyoid mite species from Iran (Acari, Eriophyidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Xue, Xiao-Feng, Sadeghi, Hussein, Hong, Xiao-Yue, Sinaie, Samira (2011): Nine eriophyoid mite species from Iran (Acari, Eriophyidae). ZooKeys 143: 23-45, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.143.2162, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.143.2162
